mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_PROFILE, TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') AS MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE, ADMIN_YN, MEMBER_DEL_YN FROM "MEMBER"
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_YN = 'N' AND MEMBER_ID || MEMBER_NAME || MEMBER_EMAIL || MEMBER_NICKNAME || MEMBER_TEL LIKE '%' || #{memberSearch} || '%'
